Field Crops نباتات مزرعی

These materials are designed to assist vocational instructors, professors, and extension workers in planning and implementing agricultural lessons. Unlike other materials on e-Afghan Ag, these materials assume some prior knowledge of agriculture. For a more practical approach to Field Crops, please visit the Grains & Field Crops tab on the blue bar above.

Content

  • Overview

Overview

  • Material from the Laboratory of Jerry Peters (Purdue) unless noted otherwise.
